entities.description: An identifier assigned to specific drugs or substances.
The name of the drug or substance used.
The number of times a specific drug or substance was mentioned.
The percentage that a specific drug or substance accounts for out of all drugs mentioned.

relationships.description: Associates a drug code with its corresponding drug name.
Relates the number of times a drug was mentioned to its corresponding drug code.
Relates the percentage of mentions out of all drugs to its corresponding drug code.
